medical_history.chief_complaint: The patient visited the hospital with uncorrected vision.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had been wearing glasses for several years, with his best-corrected visual acuity measured at 20/200 in both eyes. Symptoms included mild hyperopic refractive error of +1.5 diopters, photophobia, and slow pendular nystagmus. Changes over time are not specified.
medical_history.family_history: There was no previous family history of ocular, systemic, or chromosomal disorders.
